title: Warm
author: ForcedIntoRehab
citation: ForcedIntoRehab. "Warm: experience with Ginseng (ID 79820)". Erowid.org. Jul 11, 2009. erowid.org/exp/79820
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

report: After drinking 5 fresh ginseng root teas (those 4oz 'shots' of ginseng with the little root inside like a carrot) I experienced a warm body sensation and euphoria equivalent cannabis. I would best describe it as a weak roll without the psychadelic part.
